content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The boiler is currently out of fuel, while the offshore pump is operational.

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of a lab (position -21.5, 25.5). The lab is currently not powered.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) with coal as fuel and producing iron plates.
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) with coal as fuel and producing copper plates.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50270) at position (-11.5, 21.5) is full of water.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50272) at position (-4.5, 21.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50273) at position (-4.5, 23.5) is empty.

### Electricity network
Consists of multiple small electric poles:
- Small electric pole (position -15.5, 18.5)
- Small electric pole (position -15.5, 19.5)
- Small electric pole (position -15.5, 21.5)
- Additional poles are present but not listed due to space.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) is currently not receiving electricity.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electric poles
- Ensure that electric poles are placed in unoccupied tiles. Attempting to place poles in occupied positions will result in failure.
- Verify that electric poles are properly connected to the electric network to power entities such as labs and assembling machines.

### Errors when trying to pick up entities
- Confirm the existence of the entity at the specified position before attempting to pick it up. If the entity cannot be found, it will lead to an error.

### Errors when connecting to power
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to a functional electric network. If a lab or machine is not powered, check the connections and the status of nearby electric poles.
